title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
t rock hanging by a coiled rope above (X:288 Y: 345). You can shoot the coiled rope to drop the rock, making a giant hole in the ground. You can then drop down the hole and have access to the Refectory via a different entrance.

Once inside, you can go through the door in front of you(X:-162 Y:-317) but be careful, as you will face five enemies in the area.

Deal with them as you see fit, then you can loot the book named Journey Through The Jungle from the enemy Cefrey. The door on the south sid
